pages.text: Because mining in the Overworld is for chumps!$(p)The caverns are a series of unlockable mining dimensions. The portals are made out of mossy cobblestone in the shape of a vanilla nether portal. Instead of flint & steel, use the material below to light the portal:

• $(l)Emerald:$() This is your first cavern, where you earn skill by mining to access the more advanced caverns below$(p)• $(l)Diamond:$() Large cavern$(p)• $(l)Aquamarine:$() Aqua Cavern$(p)• $(l)Mirage World Books:$() found in cavern libraries, these books access unique and rare Mirage dimensions. These libraries are hidden withing the stone of the first cavern dimension.
